Package in.theshiftai.sdk.api

Class MessagesApi

java.lang.Object
in.theshiftai.sdk.api.MessagesApi
public class MessagesApi extends Object
API for platform message operations. Provides methods for submitting messages and retrieving message history.

  • Method Details

    • sendHumanMessage

      public MessagesApi.HumanMessageBuilder sendHumanMessage()
      Send a human message using builder pattern. Automatically sets senderType=HUMAN and messageType=TEXT.
      Returns:
      HumanMessageBuilder for fluent API

    • sendBotMessage

      public MessagesApi.BotMessageBuilder sendBotMessage()
      Send a bot message using builder pattern. Automatically sets senderType=BOT and messageType=TEXT. Requires replyMessageId and ragContext.
      Returns:
      BotMessageBuilder for fluent API

    • getAll

      public CompletableFuture<List<PlatformMessage>> getAll()
      Get all platform messages for the authenticated project. GET /api/platform/messages
      Returns:
      CompletableFuture with list of all messages

    • getById

      public CompletableFuture<PlatformMessage> getById(UUID messageId)
      Get platform message by ID. GET /api/platform/messages/{messageId}
      Parameters:
      messageId - UUID of the message
      Returns:
      CompletableFuture with the message

    • submit

      public CompletableFuture<PlatformMessageSubmissionResponse> submit(PlatformMessageSubmissionRequest request)
      Submit a platform message with full request object (low-level method). POST /api/platform/messages/submit
      Parameters:
      request - Complete message submission request object
      Returns:
      CompletableFuture with submission response

    • getByAgent

      public CompletableFuture<List<PlatformMessage>> getByAgent(UUID agentId)
      Get platform messages by agent. GET /api/platform/messages/agent/{agentId}
      Parameters:
      agentId - UUID of the agent
      Returns:
      CompletableFuture with list of messages from the agent
